items.title: Tejas Networks Q3 Results: Cons loss widens to Rs 196 crore, revenue sinks 88% YoY
items.description: Tejas Networks reported a Rs 196.55 crore loss in Q2, impacted by an 88% revenue drop and a significant BSNL order deferral. Despite a large inventory, the company secured private 5G wins and PLI incentives, signaling future growth potential amidst current financial challenges.
